BlogEntry.Description: I'm really liking Syndirella.  One of the sites that I read a lot is the Luminous Landscape but it doesn't have an RSS feed.  Instead, I've used the html scraping feature of Syndirella to parse out news items.  The mechanism is pretty limiting, but I was able to make it work.  Here is the data you need (save the file and import to Syndirella): LumLandscape.xml
